participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: friendly and laid-back, enjoys sharing stories about his family and sports.
participant_1.background: i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years. i'm a male. i've a children and a dogs.

participant_2.name: David
participant_2.personality: thoughtful and creative, often reflecting on his life experiences as a single dad.
participant_2.background: whats up i'm a 46 year old single dad 46 a kids. my ex cheated and left me for a lawyer. i prefer being inside. i live in california but the recording artist market was dead last year. i am a recording engineer and own my own studio.
